data_allocations.instream_payload:
DELETE PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNPMAST
 DELETE PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNT
 DELETE PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNL
 DELETE PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVSM
 DELETE PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVOM
 DELETE PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVDM
 DELETE PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVAM
 SET MAXCC = 0
 /*
 /* Delete, Define, and Initialize the Package/Component Masters.
 /*
 DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNPMAST)                  +
   RECORDSIZE(150,4096) UNIQUE INDEXED KEYS(12,0)              +
   FREESPACE(20 20)                                            +
   SHAREOPTIONS(2,3))                                          +
  DATA(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNPMAST.DATA)                       +
   CYLINDERS(200,50)                                           +
   CISZ(32768))                                                +
  INDEX(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNPMAST.INDEX)                     +
   CYLINDERS(1,1)                                              +
   CISZ(2048))
 REPRO IFILE(DUMMY)    ODS(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNPMAST)
 DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNT)                  +
   RECORDSIZE(150,4096) UNIQUE INDEXED KEYS(22,0)              +
   FREESPACE(20 20)                                            +
   SHAREOPTIONS(2,3))                                          +
  DATA(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNT.DATA)                       +
   CYLINDERS(50,25)                                            +
   CISZ(32768))                                                +
  INDEX(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNT.INDEX)                     +
   CYLINDERS(1,1)                                              +
   CISZ(2048))
  REPRO IFILE(DUMMY) +
    ODS(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNT)
 DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNL)                  +
   RECORDSIZE(400,4096) UNIQUE INDEXED KEYS(255,0)             +
   FREESPACE(20 20)                                            +
   SHAREOPTIONS(2,3))                                          +
  DATA(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNL.DATA)                       +
   CYLINDERS(10,10)                                            +
   CISZ(32768))                                                +
  INDEX(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNL.INDEX)                     +
   CYLINDERS(1,1)                                              +
   CISZ(2048))
  REPRO IFILE(LONGDMY) +
    ODS(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNCMPNL)
 /*
 /* SITE MASTER
 /*
 DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVSM)                   +
   RECORDSIZE(12288 20200) KEYS(55 0)                          +
   FREESPACE(10 10)                                            +
   SHAREOPTIONS(2 3))                                          +
  DATA(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVSM.DATA)                        +
   CYLINDERS(20,20)                                            +
   CISZ(4096))                                                 +
  INDEX(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVSM.INDEX)                      +
   CYLINDERS(1,1)                                              +
   CISZ(2048))
 REPRO IFILE(CMNSQSAM) ODS(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVSM)
 /*
 /* OBJECT MASTER
 /*
 DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVOM)                   +
   RECORDSIZE(200 4089) KEYS(75 0)                             +
   FREESPACE(10 10)                                            +
   SHAREOPTIONS(2 3))                                          +
  DATA(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVOM.DATA)                        +
   CYLINDERS(20,20)                                            +
   CISZ(4096))                                                 +
  INDEX(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVOM.INDEX)                      +
   CYLINDERS(1,1)                                              +
   CISZ(2048))
 REPRO IFILE(CMNOQSAM) ODS(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVOM)
 /*
 /* DELTA  MASTER
 /*
 DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVDM)                   +
   RECORDSIZE(12288 22524) KEYS(12 0)                          +
   FREESPACE(10 10)                                            +
   SHAREOPTIONS(2 3))                                          +
  DATA(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVDM.DATA)                        +
   CYLINDERS(10,10))                                           +
  INDEX(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVDM.INDEX)                      +
   CYLINDERS(1,1)                                              +
   CISZ(1024))
 REPRO IFILE(CMNDQSAM) ODS(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVDM)
 /*
 /* ARCHIVE  MASTER
 /*
 DEFINE CLUSTER (NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVAM)                   +
   RECORDSIZE(3700 22576) KEYS(64 0)                           +
   FREESPACE(10 10)                                            +
   SHAREOPTIONS(2 3))                                          +
  DATA(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVAM.DATA)                        +
   CYLINDERS(10,10))                                           +
  INDEX(NAME(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVAM.INDEX)                      +
   CYLINDERS(1,1)                                              +
   CISZ(1024))
 REPRO IFILE(CMNAQSAM) ODS(PROD.CMN.CMND.CMNSVAM)
 /*
 /* Copy the recovery file
 /*
 REPRO IFILE(CMNRECV) OFILE(CMNRQSAM)

COPY TABLESPACE CMNDADM.CMNDASP1 COPYDDN DB2ADM01
 COPY TABLESPACE CMNDADM.CMNDASP2 COPYDDN DB2ADM02
